summary: Medicare Part B's Physician Fee Schedule covers payments for services such as office visits. Some have noted that payment rates may not fully account for the unique local characteristics of Alaska, Hawaii, and the U.S. territories. In 2019, payment rates for selected services in Alaska were considerably higher than national rates (e.g., 39% higher for certain ER visits), while most payment rates in Hawaii and...
title: Medicare Physician Services: Payment Rates, Utilization, and Expenditures of Selected Services in Alaska, Hawaii, and the U.S. Territories
